about_the_game:
DEADSWITCH COMBAT is an action packed 2D multiplayer shooter that builds upon the previous games.

RANKED PROGRESSION

Progress through the ranks by earning XP in-game by killing enemies, scoring objectives, and completing challenges. Unlock new weapons, attachments, equipment, and vehicles to help you achieve victory in combat. Play solo or team-based game modes with other players online, or play local games against bots to hone your skills.

CO-OP SURVIVAL

Play one of many Survival modes and last as long as you can against endless waves of soldiers, helicopters, zombies, and other creatures. Submit your score in the worldwide leaderboards!

FULL WEAPON CUSTOMIZATION

Personalize over 200 weapons with optics, lasers, grips, skins, and other accessories.

IN-GAME EDITOR

Create your own maps and mission with the in-game editor and instantly play them with friends online! Share or browse creations in the Workshop.

BETA TESTING

Join the Discord to start beta testing before launch! Check the links to the right -->

KEY FEATURES

  • Plenty of game modes and maps

  • Massive selection of weapons, attachments, equipment, and skins

  • Fully customizable characters and loadouts

  • Ranked matches, multiplayer clans, and custom servers

  • Intense fast-paced gameplay

  • In-game editor and mod-friendly

name: Deadswitch Combat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit recommended

short_description: Deadswitch Combat is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter. Experience action-packed combat with hundreds of weapons, vehicle combat, and plenty of team-based game modes.
